page.title: 17LAND AND FARMING
page.content: {LAND AND FARMING} Alne is in the vale of York,the land is quite flat in the housing area,but the countryside is hilly in some parts and flat in others.It is a mixture of sand and clay and is good farm land. Most farms in the area are mixed farms. They keep sheep and cows and there is a Stud Farm for breeding horses, and several pig units . Farmers grow potatoes and some are sent to crisps and frozen food producers.Silage and hay are collected for winter feed .Sugar beet is sent to the sugar factory at York . Barley is used for brewing and animal feed. Turnips and mangolds are used for animal feed in winter.
